channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:38 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:38 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:49 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 🟢 08:49 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:37 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 07:37 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 04:57 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region.
